    • BotAccount

      public BotAccount(String subreddit, String name, String id, String user, Boolean verified, Boolean has_verified_email, Boolean is_gold, Boolean is_mod, Boolean is_employee, int awardee_karma, int awarder_karma, int link_karma, int comment_karma, int total_karma, String created, String comment, boolean upvote, boolean downvote, boolean bot) throws IOException, InterruptedException
      Constructor with parameters
      Parameters:
      subreddit - The specific subreddit
      name - The name associated with the account
      id - The account ID
      user - The username
      verified - If account is verified
      has_verified_email - If E-mail has been verified on account
      is_gold - If account has gold status
      is_mod - Is a moderator
      is_employee - Is an employee
      awardee_karma - Karma gained from awardee
      awarder_karma - Karma gained from awarder
      link_karma - Karma gained from link
      comment_karma - Karma gained from comment
      total_karma - Total karma on account
      created - When the account was created
      comment - A comment on a post
      upvote - An upvote on a post or comment
      downvote - A downvote on a post or comment
      bot - Whether this is a bot
      Throws:
      IOException - I/O Exception
      InterruptedException - Interrupted Exception

      Determines if user is a bot and returns result to web app
      Parameters:
      name - username of redditor to scan
      commentScore - similarity score of comments
      submissionScore - similarity score of submissions
      Returns:
      whether user is a bot or human
